trans-unit.resname: DD2·54 | Cone of Flame | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to target creature or player, 2 damage to another target creature or player, and 3 damage to a third target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Fireblast
trans-unit.target: Fireblast

trans-unit.source: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.
trans-unit.target: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

trans-unit.source: Fireball
trans-unit.target: Fireball

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to play Fireball, pay {1} for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
trans-unit.target: As an additional cost to play Fireball, pay {1} for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.

trans-unit.source: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.
trans-unit.target: The spell fell upon the crowd like a dragon, ancient and full of death.

trans-unit.source: Demonfire
trans-unit.target: Demonfire

trans-unit.source: Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead. Hellbent If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.
trans-unit.target: Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead. Hellbent If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.

trans-unit.source: Keldon Megaliths
trans-unit.target: Keldon Megaliths

trans-unit.source: Keldon Megaliths comes into play tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Hellbent {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Play this ability only if you have no cards in hand.
trans-unit.target: Keldon Megaliths comes into play tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool. Hellbent {1}{R}, {T}: Keldon Megaliths deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Play this ability only if you have no cards in hand.
